Tamahagane is a steelmaking material. It's not particularly expensive, but a little hard to get.
 $(br)First, try to make a blast furnace.
To get tamahagane, you need Crushed Iron Ore, and put it in Blast furnace.$(br)Don't forget fuel, it's necessary.
Now you get steel ingot, try to make your blade now.
